Seven Swipe up to begin (after 5 sec. break) … 5 seconds break before first exercise … //Menu Settings Settings | Help | About License Help Changelog About the app Settings See what\'s new … App is licensed under GPL3 Learn about the swipe gestures … TTS Do you want to hear voice commands? Beep Do you want to hear a short \"Beep\" after each exercise? Exercises //Snackbar A short Break … … let\'s start again! Done! That\'s the first exercise. That\'s the last exercise. Please change from right to left side. //Titles 1. Exercise - Jumping jacks 2. Exercise - Wall sit 3. Exercise - Push ups 4. Exercise - Abdominal crunch 5. Exercise - Step up on chair 6. Exercise - Squat 7. Exercise - Tricepts on chair 8. Exercise - Plank 9. Exercise - High knees running 10. Exercise - Lunge 11. Exercise - Push up with rotation 12. Exercise - Side plank right 12. Exercise - Side plank left 1. Exercise 2. Exercise 3. Exercise 4. Exercise 5. Exercise 6. Exercise 7. Exercise 8. Exercise 9. Exercise 10. Exercise 11. Exercise 12. Exercise Jumping jacks Wall sit Push ups Abdominal crunch Step up on chair Squat Tricepts on chair Plank High knees running Lunge Push up with rotation Side plank Break - then: Wall sit Break - then: Push ups" Break - then: Abdominal crunch Break - then: Step up on chair Break - then: Squat Break - then: Tricepts on chair" Break - then: Plank Break - then: High knees running Break - then: Lunge Break - then: Push up with rotation Break - then: Side plank right Break - please change sides //License Dialog OK Copyright © 2016 by Gaukler Faun Contributors:

The pictures from the workout can be found on the Blog of \"C. Gilbert\" (http://almostfearless.com/the-21-minute-workout-or-7-minutes-if-youre-really-fit). Thanks to her for the permission to use them in the app. //Changelog Dialog For more informations visit the project site on github:
https://github.com/scoute-dich/Sieben

v1.7.2 - 1.7.2.1:
• bug fixes

v1.7 - 1.7.1:
• option to select exercises
• fixed lint warnings

v1.6 - 1.6.2:
• fixed broken link
• removed fab-button
• added audio settings
• split last exercise in two parts
• break before first exercise

v1.5:
• text to speech support
• countdown pause and resume support
• code clean up

v1.4:
• set screen orientation to portrait
• fixed project-link

v1.3.1:
• added Japanese translation

v1.3:
• added swipe function (see help dialog)
• keep screen awake
• new dialogs (help/changelog)

v1.2:
• changed default language to english

v1.1:
• better integration of snackbar

v1.0:
• first release //Help Dialog Swipe on left: switch to next exercise

Swipe on right: switch to previous exercise

Swipe on bottom: make a break

Swipe on top: restart actual exercise
